summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer to be known as Laurelhurst Trunk Sewer Unit \#2, in an easement across private property, along the shore of Lake Washington from East 43rd Street to Ambleside, (an undedicated street in the unrecorded plat of Windermere) all in accordance with Resolution No. 12855 of the City Council of thre City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon the property in said district, payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement.
